subject: Education (K-12)
Basketball
Shutdowns (Institutional)
organizations: St Patrick High School Academy (Elizabeth, NJ)
lead_paragraph: Despite a shrinking student body, St. Patrick became well known in recent years for producing a disproportionate number of Division I college players, several of whom went on to play in the N.B.A.
snippet: Despite a shrinking student body, St. Patrick became well known in recent years for producing a disproportionate number of Division I college players, several of whom went on to play in the N.B.A.
